definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The advanced beginner uses best practices.
These mistakes are common for beginners.
sentences.chinese: 这些是初学者常犯的错误。

sentences.english: "Is the Tao in a hand-held calculator?" asked the novice.
sentences.chinese: “难道也存在于手持式的计算嚣里？”，初学者问。

sentences.english: Here is a short collection of tips to help beginners start slacklining.
sentences.chinese: 这里是用来帮助初学者开始走扁带一些小的提示。

sentences.english: That is the only way a style can be cultivated by a beginner.
sentences.chinese: 初学者只有借这个方法，才能培植出他的文体。

sentences.english: The best position for beginners is with the receiver lying on his back with the giver lying on the stomach along side.
sentences.chinese: 初学者的最佳体位是女方仰卧而男方趴在旁边。

sentences.english: Both have very good beginner trails and challenging terrain park.
sentences.chinese: 两个地方都有很好的初学者雪道和很强的地形区。

sentences.english: Its very hard for beginners to understand that your footwork is the key to improvement.
sentences.chinese: 初学者很难理解脚法对于进阶的重要性。

sentences.english: As a Esperantist, I am just a beginner.
sentences.chinese: 作为世界语者，我仅仅是个初学者。

sentences.english: Madame Curie warned learners not to go too fast.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫人告诫初学者不要图快。

sentences.english: Arthur yri(FPO, AP United States)：This is an excellent resource for teaching beginner English conversation .
sentences.chinese: 这是一套英语口语初学者极好的教材。
我只不过是一个初学者。

sentences.english: Otis' computer class is for older tyros who are terrified of using a computer.
sentences.chinese: 奥蒂斯的电脑课是为惧怕使用电脑的年老初学者开的。

sentences.english: Prithee, novice, forbear, For I'd not have the world to see thee.
sentences.chinese: 请你，初学者，且忍耐，因为我不愿意让世界看你。

sentences.english: This e-book goes over the easiest method for beginners to use.
sentences.chinese: 本电子书越过初学者使用简便方法。

sentences.english: Another thing that a new user should not ignore is the beauty of area light.
sentences.chinese: 初学者不应忽视的另一件事情是面光的美丽效果。

definition: entrance door/to enter a door/introduction (to a subject)
(oral) to write (esp. for a living)/to spell out laboriously on squared paper
